note.p: Birth: Lewisham, London, England (23 or 28 October 1868)
Career: President, InstAE, 1910-1911; Member, Advisory Committee for Aeronautics
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1945-1948 vol 5 pp 757-766, plate, by H R Ricardo
References: Sir Harold Hartley, 'The Debt of Engineering to Fellows of the Royal Society' in NR 1961 vol 16 pp 136-140
J A D Ackroyd, 'Sir George Cayley, the father of aeronautics, Part 1. The invention of the aeroplane' NR 2002 vol 56 pp 167-181
J Corden, 'Web of Science History' project in NR 2002 vol 56 pp 383-388
Notes: TR and DNB give birth date as 23 October 1868; Index to BR and DSB give 28 October 1868
